actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A resolution to refer the bill (S. 2246) entitled "A bill for the relief of Mrs. Ascencion M. Lujan, Noe Lujan, Sevedeo Lujan, Jr., Cordelia Lujan Long, Antonioa Lujan, Venceslao Lujan, Marta Lujan, Felix Lujan, and Tovias Lujan," to the Chief Commissioner of the U.S. Court of Claims for a report thereon.

summary.text: Refers S. 2246 to the Chief Commissioner of the Court of Claims for a report of findings and conclusions sufficient to inform the Congress of the nature and character of the demand as a claim against the United States.

titles.title: A resolution to refer the bill (S. 2246) entitled "A bill for the relief of Mrs. Ascencion M. Lujan, Noe Lujan, Sevedeo Lujan, Jr., Cordelia Lujan Long, Antonioa Lujan, Venceslao Lujan, Marta Lujan, Felix Lujan, and Tovias Lujan," to the Chief Commissioner of the U.S. Court of Claims for a report thereon.
